title: The prodigals teares. With a heavenly new yeeres gift sent to the soule; contayning many most zealous and comfortable prayers, with deuout meditations: both worthie the acceptance of all Christians, and their expence of time to peruse. By H. G. preacher of the most sacred Word of God
author: Brathwaite, Richard, 1588?-1673.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by B. A[lsop] for Iohn Browne, and are to be sold at his shop in Little Brittaine neere Duck Lane end: or else at Bernard Alsop his house, at S. Annes Church, neere Aldersgate,
